short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate words using Google Translate API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Type or paste a word or phrase inside the extension box and select a language and press the "Translate" button. Then you can see the translation in the bottom part of the extension pop-up box. Remember that the default translation language is set to English.
